column1: Tragulus javanicus;Javan Chevrotain;One of the smallest ungulates in the world. Despite their small size
column2: they fiercely defend their territory - males are equipped with long fangs
column4: and in order to apologize to the enemy
column5: they can make noise by hitting their hooves on the ground with a frequency of 7 times per second. Their diet consists mainly of young shoots and leaves
